entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria or possibly exceed them in localised areas. Thunderstorms possible from Thursday evening. Note, a more significant heavy rain event is expected on Saturday and early Sunday. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
